radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild dependent atelectasis in lung bases; 8-mm right hepatic lobe hypoenhancing lesion likely a small hamartoma or cyst; normal appendix at base but increased caliber in mid-section with wall thickening and hyperemia; neighboring stranding and thickening of adjacent fascia; prominent mesenteric nodes; no intra- or extra-hepatic bile duct dilation; no free air or fluid collections present.
